flawed_nl_solution:
Before the extra colored pencils, he had 150/5=<<150/5=30>>30 colored pencils in each container.
With the other colored pencils, he is given he now has 150+30=<<150+30=180>>180 colored pencils
If you distribute them evenly each container should have 180/5=<<180/5=63>>63 colored pencils
#### 63

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
